title: Someone hacked into my account
body: Someone hacked into my account and change the email it's linked to and I can't change the password anymore.

replies.body: There are a few ways to help getting your account!  As a first step, we have an [account recovery ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account)guide that will provide some steps towards helping you regain and secure your account.  If you're still unable to regain access, please reach out to us through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team will help out.  We'll respond as soon as possible!

Communicate with Riot’s [Account Support Centre.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584)


* The primary category is already chosen. 


* Under the secondary select **Account.**


* For the tertiary category select **Management.**

Explain your issue clearly.
